short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Allow user to create folders to group items in the IFTTT application

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: I created this extension because IFTTT does not allow the creation of folders/groups for the applets. It's intended use is only for the "My Applets" page on IFTTT. Folders can be created with a name, a list of the applet IDs that will be contained in that folder, and a color just to spice it up. This is a side project developed in the span of a few hours, so there may be some issues. I'll try to maintain it as best I can and I'm open to new suggestions.
